title.newValue: Microsoft 365 compliance center: Microsoft Purview | Communication Compliance - Analyze linked content from OneDrive and SharePoint online (modern attachments)

description.newValue:
,Communication Compliance policies that detect violations in Microsoft Teams will now analyze the content of documents shared in chat for potential policy match. Currently available in public preview. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance helps organizations detect explicit code of conduct and regulatory compliance violations, such as harassing or threatening language, sharing of adult content, and inappropriate sharing of sensitive information. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are explicitly opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
Preview date: October CY2021
